fil.hours: Oras ng operasyon: Lunes–Biyernes 08:00–17:00; Sabado 08:00–12:00. Sarado tuwing Linggo at sa mga holidays.
fil.opening_days: Bukas ang klinika Lunes hanggang Sabado. Para sa partikular na petsa (hal. special holidays), pakitingnan ang announcements o tawagan kami.
fil.appointments: Para magpa-appointment: mag-log in at gamitin ang 'Book Appointment' page, o tumawag sa clinic hotline. Maaari ring mag-request ng petsa at oras sa loob ng app.
fil.walk_in: Tumatanggap ng walk-in patients kapag may available na slots, pero mas mainam magpa-appointment para siguradong makakonsulta agad.
fil.reschedule: Para mag-reschedule ng appointment, buksan ang iyong appointment sa app at piliin ang 'Reschedule' o tumawag sa clinic para tulong.
fil.cancel: Pwede mag-cancel ng appointment sa app sa pamamagitan ng 'Cancel' button o tumawag sa clinic. May cancellation policy? Pakitingnan ang appointment terms o tumawag.
fil.contact: Email: clinic@documed.com. Hotline: (insert clinic phone). Para sa mabilis na tugon, gamitin ang Book Appointment o tumawag sa clinic during office hours.
fil.location: Ang klinika ay matatagpuan sa (insert clinic address). May parking area at malapit sa main gate. Para sa eksaktong directions, gamitin ang map app at hanapin ang 'DocuMed Clinic'.
fil.services: Serbisyo: general check-ups, dental treatment (fillings, extractions), medical certificates, health counseling, at basic laboratory tests. Para sa kumpletong listahan, pumunta sa Services page.
fil.dental_procedures: Nagbibigay kami ng dental cleaning, fillings, extractions, at simple restorative procedures. Para sa espesyal na dental surgery, maaaring mag-refer sa partner hospital.
fil.medical_certificate: Nag-iisyu ng medical certificate pagkatapos ng konsultasyon. Dalhin ang ID at anumang kinakailangang dokumento. May fee ang certificate depende sa uri.
fil.documents_required: Dalhin po ang valid ID at anumang referral o medical documents. Para sa students, pakita ang school ID kung kinakailangan.
fil.medical_records: Para humiling ng medical records, mag-request sa Medical Records section sa app o mag-email sa clinic. May processing time at maaaring may maliit na fee.
fil.prescriptions: Kung kailangan ng reseta, makukuha ito pagkatapos ng konsultasyon. Para sa refill requests, makipag-ugnayan sa klinika o sundin ang refill flow sa app.
fil.fees_payment: Tumatanggap kami ng cash at card. Para sa mga serbisyo may nakalista na fee sa Services page. Para sa estimate, tawag o magtanong sa clinic.
fil.insurance: Tumatanggap ng ilang insurance plans. Ipaalam sa clinic ang insurance provider bago ang appointment para sa verification.
fil.emergency: Kung emergency (malubha na pagdurugo, hirap sa paghinga, matinding sakit), pumunta agad sa pinakamalapit na ER o tawagan ang lokal na emergency number. Klinika ang nagseserbisyo ng non-life-threatening care lamang.
fil.teleconsult: May teleconsultation option ba? Oo—kung available, mag-book ng teleconsult sa app at susundan kayo ng staff para sa link o tawag.
fil.lab_tests: Nag-aalok ng basic lab tests (CBC, urine analysis). Para sa partikular na tests, magtanong sa clinic para sa availability at prep instructions.
fil.referral: Kung kailangan ng specialist referral, ang doktor ng klinika ay mag-iisyu ng referral at magbibigay ng instructions kung saan magpunta.
fil.privacy: Pinapangalagaan namin ang patient privacy. Ang medical records ay confidential at ibabahagi lamang kung may pahintulot o ayon sa batas.
fil.covid_policy: May mga updated na protocols para sa respiratory illness. Kung may lagnat o sintomas, ipagbigay-alam muna sa clinic bago dumating para sa tamang routing.
fil.online_portal: Ang online portal ay ginagamit para sa pag-book, pag-view ng records, at pagkuha ng notifications. Kung may problema sa portal, i-report sa support team.
fil.account_help: Para sa account issues (forgot password, profile update), gamitin ang Forgot Password link o i-update ang profile sa app settings. Para tulong, mag-email sa support.
fil.thanks: Walang anuman — laging handa tumulong ang DocuMed Clinic. Kung may iba pang tanong, itanong lang dito o kontakin ang clinic.
fil.default: Paumanhin, hindi ma-access ang AI ngayon. Para mabilis na tulong: Tingnan ang hours: Lunes–Biyernes 08:00–17:00; mag-book ng appointment sa Book Appointment page o email clinic@documed.com.

en.hours: Clinic hours: Mon–Fri 08:00–17:00; Sat 08:00–12:00. Closed on Sundays and public holidays.
en.opening_days: The clinic is open Monday to Saturday. For specific dates (e.g., special holidays) please check announcements or call us.
en.appointments: To book an appointment: log in and use the 'Book Appointment' page, or call the clinic hotline. You can also request a preferred date/time within the app.
en.walk_in: Walk-in patients are accepted when slots are available, but booking is recommended to ensure timely consultation.
en.reschedule: To reschedule an appointment, open your appointment in the app and choose 'Reschedule' or call the clinic for assistance.
en.cancel: You can cancel appointments via the app using the 'Cancel' button or by calling the clinic. See appointment terms for cancellation policy.
en.contact: Email: clinic@documed.com. Hotline: (insert clinic phone). For a faster response, use the Book Appointment feature or call during office hours.
en.location: The clinic is located at (insert clinic address). There is parking available near the main gate. For exact directions, use a maps app and search 'DocuMed Clinic'.
en.services: Services: general check-ups, dental treatment (fillings, extractions), medical certificates, health counseling, and basic lab tests. See the Services page for a full list.
en.dental_procedures: We provide dental cleaning, fillings, extractions, and simple restorative procedures. For specialized dental surgery, we may refer to a partner hospital.
en.medical_certificate: Medical certificates are issued after consultation. Bring a valid ID and any required documents. Fees vary by certificate type.
en.documents_required: Please bring a valid ID and any referral or medical documents. Students should present their school ID if required.
en.medical_records: To request medical records, submit a request in the Medical Records section of the app or email the clinic. Processing time and a nominal fee may apply.
en.prescriptions: Prescriptions are provided after consultation. For refill requests, contact the clinic or follow the refill flow in the app.
en.fees_payment: We accept cash and card. Service fees are listed on the Services page. For an estimate, call or ask the clinic.
en.insurance: We accept selected insurance plans. Inform the clinic of your provider before the appointment for verification.
en.emergency: In case of emergency (severe bleeding, difficulty breathing, severe pain), go to the nearest ER or call emergency services. The clinic handles non-life-threatening care.
en.teleconsult: Teleconsultation may be available. Book a teleconsult in the app and staff will follow up with the link or call.
en.lab_tests: We offer basic lab tests (CBC, urine analysis). For specific tests, ask the clinic about availability and preparation instructions.
en.referral: If a specialist referral is needed, the clinic doctor will issue a referral and provide instructions on where to go.
en.privacy: We protect patient privacy. Medical records are confidential and are only shared with consent or as required by law.
en.covid_policy: Updated protocols may apply for respiratory illnesses. If you have fever or symptoms, inform the clinic before arriving for proper routing.
en.online_portal: The online portal is used for booking, viewing records, and receiving notifications. Report portal issues to support.
en.account_help: For account issues (forgot password, profile update), use the Forgot Password link or update profile in app settings. For help, email support.
en.thanks: You’re welcome — DocuMed Clinic is here to help. If you have more questions, ask here or contact the clinic.
en.default: Sorry, AI is not available right now. For quick help: Check our hours: Mon–Fri 08:00–17:00; book an appointment via the Book Appointment page or email clinic@documed.com.
